Posts.Content: Thanks very much - that will be extremely helpful :)
Posts.Title: Phyllodes Sarcoma of the breast

Posts.Content: Hi Bexxc, There is a patient-led support group on Facebook for phyllodes patients and their families.  There are over 750 of us on there who have been through every type of phyllodes diagnosis and from all over the world - so you will find plenty of support for you and your mother.   If you would like to find out more, please go to https://www.facebook.com/groups/PhyllodesSupportGroup/ Laura.
Posts.Title: Phyllodes Sarcoma of the breast
